body_html:
There's a few things I don't get:

how do you pass the flag that names the manifest file into the build? do you do a point edit to the build_defs.bzl file?

it looks to me (without actually trying it though) that the manifest file is consumed at test run time, which means that it needs to get into the runfiles for each test. how is this achieved?

cheers

body:
There's a few things I don't get:

how do you pass the flag that names the manifest file into the build?  do you do a point edit to the build_defs.bzl file?

it looks to me (without actually trying it though) that the manifest file is consumed at test run time, which means that it needs to get into the runfiles for each test.  how is this achieved?


cheers
